duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide overall leadership of all functions within the assigned territory of the parking garage/building services business.
Oversee the development and implementation of new processes, techniques, and service procedures within the territory.
Direct all aspects of the sales cycle including solicitation, relationship development of new customers, proposal development, and oversight of repair and restoration projects.
Develop and implement sales plans in support of growth and profitability objectives.
Anticipate future needs, methods, and products and advise on these developments/requirements.
Negotiate and resolve conflicts with customers and ensure that bid scope is reflected in sales contracts.
Lead the management and oversight of repair and restoration projects.
Consult with new and existing customers as requested.

Conduct Territory team meetings for the purpose of reporting and communicating activities, policies, procedures, and results of the departments, and for coordination of functional, company, group, and corporate goals.
Maintain expenses within the yearly budget and submit reports as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s in engineering field, construction management, business management, or related program (Master's preferred)
Minimum of two years of parking garage, design, and hands-on construction and field experience
